name: Michi Gun
description:
Michi the kitten has to go through a grief due to his owner´s death and his family throws him away. left by himself on a rainy night wandering the streets he found an abandoned building, Michi discovers that what lays on it are creatures product from the traumas of the past, so he began to slay them all, but floor after floor, the enemies get harder and harder and seems to never end.

Add New Controls:

  • "key 1" -> switch Rifle
  • "key 2" -> swtich Gun 
  •  "key F" -> Lantern
